details: Reviewed repository layout and noted recent cache updates under R/cache.R and supporting scripts.
Executed pytest to gauge current state; observed failures in isoform integration test and mapper unit test due to missing PSM helper export and offline UniProt lookup.
Restored prepare_psm_file/read_psm_file exports via site_annotate.io package init for backwards compatibility.
Hardened mapper.add_uniprot cache path to tolerate sandboxed environments and normalise legacy cache rows.
Re-ran targeted and full pytest suites; all 37 tests now pass.
Transitioning attention to R tooling, starting with cache layer and run pipeline integration.
Executed bash test.sh to exercise existing R unit suites; initial cache tests revealed gaps prompting further work.
Parameterised cache DB/RDS locations via options hook, added RDS path normalisation, and created targeted testthat coverage for cache hits, RDS thresholding, and DB fallback.
Re-ran bash test.sh and full pytest suite; all R and Python tests pass with new cache coverage.
Refined cache DB helpers to manage connections via NA-aware close flags and ensured every code path disconnects, eliminating the lingering dbDisconnect warning.
Re-ran bash test.sh and pytest; all R and Python suites remain green without connection warnings.
Added pytest module to ensure key site_annotate packages import cleanly and validate io re-exports.
Expanded suite now runs 49 tests after new coverage.
